website_summaries.verdict: Large pool sand filter that's easy to maintain and mount. Offers seven different filtration settings.
pros: Tank consists of corrosion-proof materials, meaning it should last a long time in all kinds of weather
Features a large drain so you can perform service quickly
Distributes the water evenly throughout the sand for the most efficient filtering performance
cons: Far pricier than other sand pumps
Seams may give out over time, causing leaks

customer_reviews.title: This sand filter worked fine for one full pool season
customer_reviews.text: This sand filter worked fine for one full pool season, then the polymer on the tank broke down and began leaking, first a small amount then a spew of water. The manufacturer, Hayward, could not be reached. Instead they provided over an hour of phone wait time, urging use of the online instructions, which, of course would not address a defective product. The tank seems the most simple of the components and this one is clearly defective, unless the intended lifespan is a few months. I thought a discount on the replacement would be appropriate, or maybe just the purchase of the tank, but neither Hayward nor Amazon was of any benefit. Bottom line-don't buy this expecting any seller accommodations.
customer_reviews.author: Cato

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed in this product. After 1 year, a seam on the main body failed, which is an indicator of poor quality manufacturing. The product was carefully selected to be sized to exceed the pumps flow capability, and was installed with great precision. Do not buy this product. Shame on me, I thought I bought I high quality product and did not pay extra for an extended warranty. Why would a person by an extended warranty on a very simple filtration item with zero moving parts? Looking for a refund, but not optimistic. will post photo's tomorrow of the point of failure.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Use a good soft / flexible sealant on the 1
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 20 year old Pentair sand filter with this Hayward S270T. It took 350 lbs of sand which I bought from Home Depot for about $38. I typically changed the sand about every 5 years, but may push it to 7 since my old filter used 225 lbs of sand. This system came with everything I expected, including a gauge. Tips: Use a good soft / flexible sealant on the 1.5" pvc pipe fittings you'll screw into the valve. Use 1.5" screw together PVC unions right off the valve so you can tighten the screw in fittings or service the sand in the future. This will keep you from cutting pipes down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Roe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal!!! Buy it now!! This comes with EVERYTHING you need! It has the pressure gauge, the guts for the sand filter, the top housing with the dial and lever and even the drain plug. The housing is well made and all the instructions are included. You can even find you tube videos to help with the installation. Pool sand can be purchased from your local home depot to load inside. You will save a ton of money doing this yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: shertherapy

customer_reviews.title: May not be reliable
customer_reviews.text: I received the item and it looked good. but jut after 6 months of installation it started to leak from the side. I contacted Hayward Pool supply and they send me a replacement. Now after 15 months of installing the replacement it is leaking again from the side. I had spent more than $400.00 and now just within the spam of 2 yrs I am looking for a replacement again. The tank was installed indoor in a room. so no heat, sun or cold weather exposure was there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with manufacture
customer_reviews.text: SOON AFTER INSTALLING THE HAYWARD SAND FILTER WE NOTICE THAT THERE WAS A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAND ON THE BOTTOM OF THE POOL. WE BACKWASHED AND DID A RINSE CYCLE. THE FOLLOWING MORING AND EACH MORNING SINCE WE CONTINUE TO FIND SAND ON THE FLOOR OF THE POOL. AMAZON REFERRED MY ISSUE TO "THE POOL SUPPLIES INC", THEY INTURN DIRECTED ME TO HAYWARD. ON AUGUST 23RD I PHONED HAYWARD. AFTER EXPLAINING MY ISSUE TO THE RECEPTIONIST. SHE ADVISED MY COMPLAINT WOULD BE FORWARDED TO A TECH/REP AND I WOULD HERE FROM THEM THAT DAY OR THE FOLLOWING DAY. IT IS NOW 5 DAYS LATER AND NO HAS CALLED. THE UNIT FILTERS WELL BUT FACTORY SUPPORT SUCKS. I'LL KEEP YOU POSTED.
customer_reviews.author: douglas f.

customer_reviews.title: Seam Failure
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the Hayward S270T2 Sand Filter for nearly three years. It has now developed a leak in the tanks seam at the neck where the neck just below the flange clamp. Of course, it is past the one year warranty and a new tank cost as much as a new complete filter. I know notice that other customers have had a similar problem with seam cracks. I guess I will just purchase a new one or look into another brand. Things are not built to last anymore - how sad.
customer_reviews.author: James Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Manufacture defect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Multiple other reviews stated same issue. Just closed from only our 4th season with this filter and it is junk. Totaling shot. The neck and side seams on both sides are busted. Started on one side several weeks ago with a slow drip. Then both sides. Then spraying everything. There is no repairing this. We’ll have to spend more money to replace in the spring. Very frustrating! Hayward is a trusted brand, that is why we trusted to spend $400 plus on this filter. Move on. Don’t waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Ennen Family

customer_reviews.title: OK Filter
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of filtering, which of course it should. What I didn't like is: Pipe threads on top valve are slightly oversize and I have had to re-make the pipe connections because of recurring leaks. It doesn't have an air purge valve. I replaced a 10-year old Hayward side valve style filter of same size that failed at the top tank flange - I hope this one lasts longer. I went with the top valve version because it was about $200 cheaper, but it was more work to redo the piping. Bought the sand at the Home Center which was the least cost.
customer_reviews.author: DDC

customer_reviews.title: Should last longer than two years
customer_reviews.text: After a little over 2 years this sand filter developed a hole in the seam. I think this product should last much longer than that. I shouldn't have to replace it this soon. Hayward is a name I have trusted for some time for my pool products, I hate it that this product didn't last like it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Neidhart

customer_reviews.title: This should have a RECALL. Weak seam at the top. Many have the same issue.
customer_reviews.text: Like so many others, the seam at the top is weak and will not last. This is clearly a flaw in design considering the number of Hayward filters having this same exact issue, in the same spot. Now looking at the spot of the fault, the resin seems to have an extra build-up from the factory which clearly doesn't work. No way to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Becci M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful water
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had to replace my older cartridge filter and was asking pool equipment places for quotes and recommendations. Most said the cartridge would give better clarity, but sand is easier. One technician commented that he uses sand filters with zeo sand and gets cartridge filter clarity with sand filter ease of use. So I chose a Hayward 244T sand filter and Zeo sand. I used 200 lbs in a 300 lb capacity filter. I followed the rinsing directions and probably even over rinsed. Started the filter and had a hint of green for a day. Now several weeks later the pool looks better than ever. Perfectly clear and blue like the ads you see for perfect pools.
customer_reviews.author: A Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Sight Glass & Sand Deposits
customer_reviews.text: After installing the product and using the backwash feature, the sight glass appeared to leak. I'm not sure if it needed more telphlone tape or need time to adjust to the temp/pressure after shipping. Also, although I followed specs for the amount of sand and purchased from Leslie's Pool Store, the filter left deposits of sand for the first few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome filter
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable fast delivery, product came with everything shown. Hook up was easy. the site ball does not fill with water and don't know why. However pressure is at 15 right where it should be. Water is the clearest its ever been. I am running it with a 1 hp pump and my pool is 17K gal 33 foot round above ground. I filled the filter half way with water and put in 6 bags of sand for a total of 300 lbs. I would recommend this product and the company every time.
customer_reviews.author: Craig kirk

customer_reviews.title: Fails at seams
customer_reviews.text: After less than 4 years tank has sprung a leak at the seam. Look at the other reviews and you will see this is more common than it should be. These tanks should hold up for a much longer time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Marthers

customer_reviews.title: Base arrived cracked
customer_reviews.text: Update-- Received a second one. The multipart handle is loose on that one. The quality suck! With the first one, I figured the based could have gotten cracked during transportation, but the loose handle is QC problem. ------------- The base arrived cracked. There are hand written markings with a black permanent marker at the bottom of the filter body (looks like a date). I sent it back and am waiting for the replacement to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and maintenance!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the 24" version of this filter before and loved it. I installed this filter with a new salt system because of the maintenance is a lot less than what a DE filter requires. This filter was so easy to setup and instructions make it a breeze. I was up and running within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joab Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and start up
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an older Hayward S244T unit, so I was already somewhat familiar with it. The new unit does have the inlet/outlet in a slightly different location, so be prepared to to redo your PVC piping. The sand fill went well, however you will need help holding the pathetic little cardboard cover in place to prevent sand getting into tube. Overall a fairly easy replacement and has been running strong for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: kfireuser

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sand filter after having a stainless steel DE filter that developed pin hole leaks after 26 years. I know that a DE filter is considered a better filter but, I had to replace the fabric membranes at least 4 times, and then to replace the DE or add it every back flush had become more effort than it was worth. The sand I hear, and I hope the information is true, last 10 years and you loose nothing in the backwash except the debris. The valve allows for several actions including a straight to trash setting for vacuuming, if you can afford the water loss. Over all this is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: MGHawk

customer_reviews.title: I would like an answer
customer_reviews.text: Took me one year to install this finally did but when I got it all up and running the valve body top mount leaks water don’t know what to do
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Clean pool
customer_reviews.text: I have an above ground pool. We have had three above ground pools for the last thirty years and I always used cartridge filters, which are a pain to clean and put the tank back together so that everything is leakproof. After installing this sand filter, my pool seems the cleanest it has ever been, and there is almost no maintainance. I am looking forward to not much work in keeping up the pool this summer! Would recommend this filter to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: So far so good will update if needed easy to install I’m a first time pool owner the filter that was on the system was really old and I was advised that replacing it was a good idea by the pool guy who closed the pool last winter so I bought it and I installed it myself I followed the directions and it works as it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spider valve bad after 1 season
customer_reviews.text: After barely 1 season the spider valve is no good and water is being pumped out of the backwash line. Should work better than this. Always turned the pump off when moving the lever and was stored as indicated in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: jAndrew

customer_reviews.title: This is my second unit... I changed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit...I changed the 1st one as it was leaking from the top section and 14 months later this new unit has the same exact problem...I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Philippe Drolet

customer_reviews.title: Can't love this baby any more!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The weather here is very very hot and conducive to Algae growth 280 days a year; I here majority pools here have cartridge filters; atleast that's what the chain stores are telling us. It's a pain for me to clean the cartridge every 5 days particularly due to the Oak tree's sheddings. I have replaced the oldy with this one three months ago. I love it. No cleaning cartridges, clean water, no mess! That's the way the filter should be! It has already saved me bunch of my time, aggravation, no more acid bathing of the cartridges, and no annual cartridge replacement, Few!
customer_reviews.author: Car Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Working flawlessly. Purchased this as a replacement for a larger one which was more than twice the price. Using on a 16x32 in ground pool, oval shaped, with a blue devil 2 speed pump on a timer. Added 300 pounds of sand, filled with water, plumbed and it’s working perfectly, running at less than 5 lbs of pressure. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: G. Middaugh

customer_reviews.title: The install was easy with a basic understanding of PVC pipe and connectors
customer_reviews.text: Pondered the move to a sand filter for a season or two but should of made the move years ago. Came in a timely manner and very well packaged. The install was easy with a basic understanding of PVC pipe and connectors. Directions are clear and easy to follow. I used a product called zero sand that provides filtering closer to DE filtering and requires half the amount of the requirements of sand. No more removing a filter, dragging out the hose and spending valuable time spraying out a paper filter. Now I just walk up, shut the pump off, TURN A VALVE :) and turn the pump back on.........life is good
customer_reviews.author: IBNFECPO

customer_reviews.title: buy with confidence, definitely over cartridge filter
customer_reviews.text: great filter! same as my pump, i was concerned about the delivery service. this was delivered upside down (with box clearly marked "this side up") and minor box damage. however no problems, works well. my pool is crystal clear. easy installation. very happy i bought this to replace my cartridge filter (what a pain that filter was). this pump backwashes in minutes and is ready to go ;the cartridge filter needed to be cleaned for 30 minutes every 1-2 months and cost $70 a year for new filter. (FYI: my pool is in a screen enclosure)
customer_reviews.author: Krackerjack

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient filter.
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient filter. Cost to fill with sand was less than buying a cartridge filter for the old system. Back-washing works well and is much easier than cleaning a cartridge. Sand should last a quite few years so this purchase should pay for itself in just a couple seasons. Pressure at 3000 RPM on Hayward SP3200VSP TriStar VS pump is about 12 PSI, and running at 1800 RPM for most of the day pressure is below 5 PSI and good flow through the skimmer and Hayward T-CELL-9 Chlorination Cell.
customer_reviews.author: gordon e luebke

customer_reviews.title: Filter cracks after only two years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this filter from "In the Swim" in April 2016. Two years later a crack appeared in the collar requiring complete filter replacement. This filter is located in Arizona, so freezing is not an issue. Other filters have worked for over 10 years, some for 20 years. Very disappointed in the quality and durability of this filter. Seller refused any type of price break of a replacement filter. Will purchase from another company. Recommend avoiding "In the Swim" store and Hayward filters.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Big difference
customer_reviews.text: Our pool filter was showing it's age at 22+ years old so we replaced it a month ago with the S244T. What a difference! Our always cloudy pool was crystal clear in a few hours after running the new filter. We should have replaced our old unit years ago. Good price from Amazon. Delivered a day early.
customer_reviews.author: JerryNJ

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has probably saved our summer!!!!!! It makes cleaning a large unground pool a piece of cake! We will finally be able to enjoy the poo more than we have to clean it!!! It is so efficient and to clean algae and debris out of the filter you just back flush it!! And it’s much more aesthetically pleasing in my opinion! Easy to install and much cheaper here on amazon than in a pool store! We saved hundreds!
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Huge upgrade over the old DE grid system
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why anyone would choose the DE system over a sand filter after having run this one. I bought an installed this filter in early January and thus far it was been amazing, its out performed my DE filter at every turn and was super easy to install. AND THAT PRICE! I thought I was gambling on this filter at first because it was priced so much lower than a comparable DE filter, but I decided to trust the Hayward brand and go for it. If you're on the fence like I was when it comes to determining what kind of filter to run on your pool just go sand, you'll never look back.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an old one
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 15+ year old one with the same model. The old one had a design feature with a protruding male threaded drain which the squirrels gnawed on all winter and ruined the threads. Hopefully this new one's design will be better. The actual filter itself works great, just as I would expect from Hayward.
customer_reviews.author: sheroz

customer_reviews.title: No issues as of yet. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and no problems with installation. Working perfectly. Just hope last longer than first one that I purchased from a local pool dealer, same brand and model. That one began leaking at the factory seam near upper neck of tank.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Plastic filter body cracked after 3.5 years
customer_reviews.text: My pool technician tried everything he could do to patch and mend, but to no avail. Ordered from Amazon 9-15-16, and it cracked March 2020. Only one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good quality made filter
customer_reviews.text: Almost exact replacement to original, except for 1” shorter which was no problem. Also doesn’t have a top full plug which I used in old one to add more sand quickly when replacing old sand. Had to install quick couplings to remove head from piping for sand replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Bishop

customer_reviews.title: So much better!
customer_reviews.text: We had an ooold fiberglass version of this filter, in 24" side valve, when we bought the house. Even with new sand it just couldn't handle the pool in the spring and took a lot of work to get it going, and bleeding air was a constant battle all year.. So I got the 27" top valve, reworked/rebuilt the entire plumbing, and fired it up first thing this spring. After just one good shock, the pool was crystal clear in 3 days. Just amazing. No fuss, no muss. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conger

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to backwash and no more cartridge elements to clean again ! After 3 years, simply drain and refill with pool filter sand that was cheaply bought. If you can do simple 1 1/2" plumbing, you can install this in a couple of hours. Youtube video certified mechanical, electrical and plumbing LOL !
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We had a 20 year old pool when we bought the house and had to replace all the equipment. We've had it for about a year now. Our local pool store recommended this. Best investment we've made to date for our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Tasha C

customer_reviews.title: 5 years in...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this filter assembly for over 5 years now and it is still performing perfectly. I have an inground pool and spa combo that is around 18,000 gallons combined. I have only had to replace the o-ring once in all that time! Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: cj3007

customer_reviews.title: Tank developed a pin hole leak along seam after 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Tank developed a pin hole leak along seam after 6 years. The Hayward CustomService Representative has reached out to me and offered to solve this problem for me in a very acceptable manner. Companies are not only know for they products but also for how they treat their customers. Hayward has impressed me with how they stand by their product. I wouldn't hesitate to buy Hayward again because of this experience.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, but see comments.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the same model that was installed when the pool was built 3 years ago. This summer, the original tank developed a pinhole leak in the side (might be a manufacturing flaw). Chose to replace with the same model to make installation easy. So far, it is working well, with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Clark

customer_reviews.title: The Seam dose split.
customer_reviews.text: 3rd season seam split, so here I am ordering a new sand filter. What a drag.. I’m not even bothering with trying to contact Hayward or Amazon ..too exhausting to even think about that process. My pool guy told me to try a Fiberglas unit. I see those rupture as well. Good luck, but the seam split is real.
customer_reviews.author: chris rix

customer_reviews.title: This was a good deal!  Bought mine in 2012 and it still works.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived really FAST and has worked perfectly. Our pool has been sparkling clear and water is probably drinking quality. Our filter had failed at the hottest, driest part of summer and every local place was overcharging for filters and labor, so I bought this one and installed it myself with some advice from Lowes. The first time I tried to rate it, Amazon would let me because it was during the delivery window and I was prompted to wait for the unit to arrive, but I had already installed it. UPDATE: Four years later and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: AnimalLuVer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from an older model that good de powder. This cleaned our pool and had no algea in such a short time. Made the process painless. We had to buy some new cvpc pipes but that was easy enough and well worth the filter being so amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love this filter
customer_reviews.text: Love this filter. Used to have D.E. filter, was real pain to keep clean, had to replace filters in assy. due to holes . Did not work as well as sand filter. Really no maint. yet. Have had for one season in Texas and have had no problems. Should have got sand filter first.
customer_reviews.author: mikeatnight

customer_reviews.title: So much better than my DE filter. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what anyone says about De filter they supposedly clean better than sand? That is if u can get them to work properly!! Never got enough presser from my de always taking it apart to clean the finger. Never worked right! Not any more with my new Hayward sand filter my pool has never looked better I run it half as much and cleaning it is as simple as turning a dial to backwash!! Now I can use my pool instead of working on it a must!!!
customer_reviews.author: francesco pomilla

customer_reviews.title: don't follow instructions for install, has you do things in wrong order.read then use common sense.
customer_reviews.text: don't follow direction in order for install, they want you to put sand in too really, read instructions than use common sense, can't move it once sand in. great product.
customer_reviews.author: john t.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This sand filter was a replacement for another exactly like it. The old one was neglected and not covered from the extreme weather elements in the southeastern US. This new Hayward sand filter will be well maintained and will provide many years of service, I'm sure. this filter is excellent and cleans the water of my salt water pool very well. Could not be happier. Thank you Hayward!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous. We bought this product and it already has a busted seam. Didn't even last 4 years. Now it is spraying water and our pool maintenance guy that installed the pool agrees it should have lasted a LOT longer. SO disappointed. What a headache!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hill

customer_reviews.title: Check the stand carefully
customer_reviews.text: The only problem we had with this item is the bottom stand was cracked on one side. We needed it immediately so we did not return it for an exchange. So far it has not cracked more and the sand filter itself is doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this filter; the delivery - not so much. Works much better than the old one it replaced. The freight line was NOT into internet order fulfillment and Amazon really needs to rethink their large package delivery if this is how larger items get shipped. It came on a full sized tractor trailer truck to my home (250' driveway curving down a hill) so the driver wheeled it down the driveway and left it in the middle of the driveway in front of the door. My wife had to move it when she got home. NOT cool.
customer_reviews.author: rondawg

customer_reviews.title: Clean pool, happy owner
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Used it to replace Hayward filter that was over 20 years old. This one had a little different plumbing, but I knew that before it came, and it was no problem rerouting the lines. Works great. Installation was easy. Valve is very similar to previous filter, but seems to work a little better. Couldn't ask for better.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new sand filter. Our old one would spit sand into the pool and didn't do a great job. We could tell the difference immediately after we installed our new one. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlady13

customer_reviews.title: Model Received Did NOT match description
customer_reviews.text: The model number ordered as indicated above is for 2” inlet/outlet piping from the valve, which is what I needed. However, the product shipped and received was model S244T for 1.5” piping. A replacement was requested to get the correct model number but I was told the 2” version was not available. The 1.5” version was installed using reducers. Hopefully it does not effect the overall filtration system and cleanliness of our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cain

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered, easy to install. The base ring was cracked on mine, but it was replacing another that was on a different base so no big issue. Be sure that you put the lower tubes in place before filling with sand, and be SURE to add water before you add sand.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Leak at the valve o-ring seal
customer_reviews.text: The tank sprung a leak at the seam close to the neck, where valve sits. Then after that, it started leaking at the seal where the valve sits. I replaced the o'ring and clamps and plugged the tank seam while I was at it. I assembled it back and it still leaks at the seat where the valve sits. I tightened the new claps; didn't fix the problem. Could the tank have warped? It is only 3 years old..
customer_reviews.author: Raul Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Second one I had and leaks at seam in just 1 year. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: S. Webb

customer_reviews.title: So happy we bought this filter
customer_reviews.text: For years I have had a DE filter and it has given us grief. While it took some effort to get the plumbing correct, we are so glad we made the switch to this sand filter. We have an indoor pool, no babies, so I think the DE was really overkill. Our water has never been clearer! It is doing a great job. Much less fuss. No DE getting in the pool. No algae. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Kavadias

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Hayward sand filter replacement for my pool. Great product and seller. Beat local sales by $ 80 to $ 100. And free shipping with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this filter.
customer_reviews.text: Just had this installed and seems to work fine. It came with everything which most veneers didn't offer. I received this very quickly. The price was very good. I would definitely use this company again.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed the new filter on 4/9/2019 and the valve DOES NOT WORK properly. Of course I had no reason to install it until warm weather arrived, therefore, I did not know it didn't function properly be the return date of 3/7/2019. Whgat do you plan to do about the defective part?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Belflower

customer_reviews.title: Open Box Item
customer_reviews.text: All items sold should be marked as "Open Box" if they have been opened! This item was delivered in the factory box; however, it had previously been open. After opening the box I discovered the only item present was the base and case! No valve or gaskets, no manual. This item was shipped and the supplier must have known it was missing parts. If not then the quality control system currently in place does not work. Buyers beware!!! A 47 pound incomplete item was shipped. Now I am inconvenience returning the 47 pound item and delayed in completing my filter system.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: this item will not last past two years
customer_reviews.text: this is the third S220T filter tank I've had in as many years. Seems once the warranty expires so the tank. Tank splits at the seams and is not repairable. Forced to use it due to the current plumbing layout.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a replacement for my old Hayward which lasted 27 years. Installed easily and works perfectly. I suggest putting o ring lube on both gaskets,one separating the valve assembly from the tank and the other being the spider gasket inside the valve assembly. Both are easy tasks.i used 150 lbs of zeo sand instead of 300 lbs of regular sand. Also, when rotating valve handle ,to go from filtration to backwash for instance ,try doing it in one direction only every time you have to rotate it.

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw: The clean water passes back up through ...
customer_reviews.text: Design Flaw: The clean water passes back up through a central plastic pipe which passes right through the swirling filthy water at the top of the tank. This pipe has a joint right in the midst of that swirling, filthy water. As the plastic pipe ages/shrinks due to chlorine, even microscopic failure of this joint begins to allow filthy water (under high pressure) to force through the joint and mix with the clean which is headed back to your pool.

product_meta.title: Hayward S244T ProSeries Sand Filter, 24-Inch, Top-Mount
product_meta.description:
Size:1.5 Inch ValveHayward S244T ProSeries Sand Filter, 24-Inch, Top-Mount

AMAZON.COM
This Hayward Pro Series sand filter for in-ground swimming pools will provide you with hassle-free, effective filtration. The weather-proof tank is constructed of a tough, color-fast polymeric material and topped with a patented 6-position multi-port valve that features easy-to-use lever action. Even water distribution over every square inch of sand is ensured by an integral top diffuser, self-cleaning under drain and 360 degree slotted laterals. Thorough backwashing allows for crystal-clear water. Advanced full-flow technology reduces energy costs by achieving excellent filtration, so you can run your filter less. Filter is complete with tank, 7-way multi-port valve, sight glass and pressure gauge. 7-way Valve Positions: Filter, Waste, Winter, Closed, Backwash, Recirculation, Rinse.
feature_bullets: Durable corrosion proof materials for dependable all weather performance
Large pressure sand/water drain for rapid winterizing or servicing
Side-mount models are available with 6-position VariFlo or 2-position slide valve
